com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler

Class MapRestErrorConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler.MapRestErrorConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestErrorConverter<java.util.Map>, org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<RestError,java.util.Map>

    public class MapRestErrorConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestErrorConverter<java.util.Map>
    Simple RestErrorConverter implementation that creates a new Map instance based on the specified RestError instance. Some HttpMessageConverters (like a JSON converter) can easily automatically convert Maps to response bodies. The map key names are customizable via setter methods (setStatusKey, setMessageKey, etc).
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    RestErrorConverter

        restError - the RestError instance to convert to another object instance 'understood' by other registered HttpMessageConverter instances.
